label.290.en_text: Infantry troops gain +3 Def when defending.

label.220.en_text: You just received this item drop and have been removed from the winning stronghold!
label.220.cn_text: 你刚刚获得了一件道具掉落并已经被移出据点！

label.286.en_text: Archer troops gain +3 Str when defending.

label.289.en_text: Archer troops gain +7 HP when defending.

label.75.en_text: 2. The hero you select will be created on the blockchain, along with all the items he is wearing. They will be stored on the blockchain as unique assets directly owned by your wallet address.
label.75.cn_text: 2. 您选择的英雄将与他所穿戴的所有装备道具一起存储在区块链上。它们将作为独特的数字资产存储在您的钱包之中。

label.291.en_text: Cavalry troops gain +2 Def when defending.

label.227.en_text: You already own a Stronghold. Try attacking a city or bandit instead!
label.227.cn_text: 你已经拥有了一个据点。尝试进攻城市或者土匪吧。

label.240.en_text: 1. Coffer payouts will be sent to lords when the timer expires.
label.240.cn_text: 1. 每当区块倒计时结束时，城市金库就会奖励当前领主玩家。

label.292.en_text: Archer troops gain +2 Def when defending.

label.333.cn_text: 1. 在任意排行榜活动中获得第1名

label.281.en_text: Infantry troops gain +8 HP when attacking.

label.76.en_text: 3. Creating a hero will cost 100 TRX. Once you create it, you will not be able to select another one, so be sure to pick the hero you like the best.
label.76.cn_text: 3. 创建英雄将花费100TRX。一旦你创建它, 你将无法重新选择另外两个选项, 所以一定要选择你最喜欢的英雄。

label.250.en_text: Leadership is determined by your body armor and will impact your total amount of troops.
label.250.cn_text: 统御由胸甲提供并决定了英雄的带兵上限。

label.248.en_text: Your hero's family tree will be accessed here in the future.
label.248.cn_text: 在未来版本中，你可以从这里进入家族系统。

label.241.en_text: 2. Payouts will be 30% of the total city coffer size.
label.241.cn_text: 2. 每次会发放城市金库总额的30%。

label.77.en_text: 4. If you want to learn more about heroes, stats, and items before making your choice, visit our Medium page or check out our Youtube tutorial series.
label.77.cn_text: 4. 如果您想在做出选择之前了解更多关于英雄、属性和道具的相关信息, 请关注我们的公众号：blocklords来查看。

label.342.en_text: 3. Once all tasks have been completed, you will be able to CLAIM a the title for your hero.
label.342.cn_text: 3. 当所有任务条件完成后，你将可以获取相应的头衔

label.78.en_text: 1. This is your inventory, where your suprlus items are stored.
label.78.cn_text: 1. 这里是您的库存, 您所拥有的未装备物品都存放在这里。

label.293.en_text: Infantry troops cause an additional 10% damage when attacking.
label.293.cn_text: 当攻击时，我方步兵会造成额外10%伤害

label.118.en_text: City Lords will receive a coffer payout each time the block timer expires. The payout will be 30% of the total city coffer and will be directly sent out to lord wallets.
label.118.cn_text: 每当区块倒计时结束时，城市的领主会获得一次城市金库发放奖励。每次城市金库将通过智能合约发放总金额的30%至当前领主的钱包之中。

label.79.en_text: 2. Your hero is currently wearing all his items in the equipment screen. Clicking on a worn item will unequip it and place it into the inventory.
label.79.cn_text: 2. 你的英雄目前装备上了您所拥有的所有装备道具。点击其中一件装备就会卸下它, 并放入您的库存中。

label.295.en_text: Archer troops cause an additional 10% damage when attacking.
label.295.cn_text: 当攻击时，我方弓兵会造成额外10%伤害

label.221.en_text: Your Stronghold was taken by another player. Now is the time for revenge!
label.221.cn_text: 你的据点被其他玩家攻占了，现在到了复仇的时候了！

label.120.en_text: New items will be dropped from one random Stronghold when the block timer expires.
label.120.cn_text: 每当区块倒计时结束时，一件新的道具会掉落至随机一个据点中。

label.225.en_text:
Sorry, all hero items of the current generation have already 
been created. A new generation will soon be minted
 on the blockchain. In the meantime, feel free to try playing 
BLOCKLORDS on other platforms!
label.225.cn_text: 抱歉，所有用于创建英雄的装备道具已经被使用。请等待下一个世代装备开启后再来尝试英雄创建。您也可以前往BLOCKLORDS的其他区块链版本进行游戏！

label.122.en_text: 1. New items will be dropped from one random Stronghold each time the counter expires.
label.122.cn_text: 1. 每当区块倒计时结束时，一件新的道具会掉落至随机一个据点中。

label.80.en_text: 3. If you want to buy more items, you can visit the city markets and buy items currently on sale.
label.80.cn_text: 3. 如果你想购买更多的装备道具, 你可以访问城市市场, 并购买目前正在出售的物品。

label.306.en_text: Cavalry troops gain +3 Str when attacking.
label.306.cn_text: 当攻击时，我方骑兵攻击+3

label.297.en_text: Cavalry troops gain +2 Def when attacking.

label.123.en_text: 2. The list shows the last winners, items elapsed, and items awarded. Only last 10 winners will be shown.
label.123.cn_text: 2. 这里会记录最近10条道具掉落记录，包括获得掉落的角色，道具本身以及多久前掉落出的。

label.251.en_text: Speed is decided by your gloves, and will determine the number of attacks you land each battle.
label.251.cn_text: 速度由护手提供，决定了战斗中攻击速度的快慢。

label.124.en_text: 3. Burned means that item was dropped to an empty stronghold.
label.124.cn_text: 3. 这里也有道具销毁记录，这意味着该道具掉落在了没有玩家占领的据点上。

label.180.en_text: In the future, lords will be able to set the tax rate of their in order to increase revenue or to attract more business. For now, the tax will remain at 10%.
label.180.cn_text: 在未来版本中，领主将能够设定城市的市场税率，以增加个人收入或吸引更多的贸易。 但目前，税率将保持在10％不变。

label.242.en_text: 3. Payouts will be sent to player wallets within 48 hours.
label.242.cn_text: 3. 金库发放会在48小时内发送至获奖领主玩家的钱包中。

label.81.en_text: 4. If you don't want to buy items, you can try capturing strongholds and wait for an item drop.
label.81.cn_text: 4. 如果您不想购买市场上的装备, 您可以尝试占领据点并等待装备道具的掉落。

label.330.en_text: 2. Be lord of 3 cities at same time.
label.330.cn_text: 2. 同时成为3座城市的领主

label.329.cn_text: 1. 在任意排行榜活动中获得前3名

label.243.en_text: 4. The list will clear out after ceach payout. Only recipients of the latest payout are visible.
label.243.cn_text: 4. 列表会在每次发放后进行记录更新，这里只显示最后一次金库发放的详细记录。

label.344.en_text: 5. In order to receive a LORD DROP, player must have a title equipped during the drop time.
label.344.cn_text: 5. 为了获得领主赏金，玩家需要在赏金支付前装备上头衔

label.252.en_text: Defense is impacted by your shield, and will reduce the amount of damage received with each enemy attack.
label.252.cn_text: 防御由盾牌提供，决定了在战斗中减免的伤害。

label.267.en_text: 4. The player with the lowest average damage during each round will earn 5 points for being the bravest player and attacking fierclessly. The player who earns the Brave Heart damage the most during the event will win the Brave Heart prize!
label.267.cn_text: 4. 每轮对目标城市造成最低平均伤害的玩家会被誉为勇敢的心并获得5点额外积分。整个活动中，荣获勇敢的心次数最多的玩家还可以获得勇敢的心特殊奖金。

label.1.en_text: Greetings, and welcome to the Closed Beta versionof BLOCKLORDS.Thisversionruns on the TRON testnet and will only be available for a limited time. In order to play, you willneed to have a tronlink wallet installed with testnet TRX in it. If you have any questions or bugs to report,please emailus atinfo@blocklords.ioand we will get back to you as soon as possible!
label.1.cn_text: 您好，欢迎来到BLOCKLORDS的TRON封测。此版本在TRON测试网上进行并邀请您进行试玩。进入游戏之前，您将需要安装Tronlink钱包并获取一定的测试网TRX。如果您有任何疑问建议或者BUG发现，请发送电子邮件至：info@blocklords.io 我们会尽快回复您！

label.82.en_text: 1. Attacking bandit leaders will increase the EXP of your items.
label.82.cn_text: 1. 攻击土匪将增加您装备道具的exp。

label.303.cn_text: 当防御时，我方骑兵会造成额外10%伤害

label.83.cn_text: 2. 一旦一个装备获得了足够的exp, 它将上升一集并获得一个额外的属性点。

label.298.en_text: Archer troops gain +2 Def when attacking.

label.228.en_text: This city market is full. Try going to another city to sell your items!
label.228.cn_text: 该城市市场已经满了。尝试去其他城市售卖你的道具吧！

label.84.en_text: 3. Item max levels depend on your item's quality.
label.84.cn_text: 3. 道具的最大等级取决于道具的品质。

label.230.cn_text: 未知的传输错误。请重试或联系客服并附上您的交易TX id，我们会尽快帮助到您。

label.88.cn_text: 3. 如果玩家占领着产出道具的据点，则会获得道具奖励并被移出据点。如果NPC占领着产出道具的据点，则该道具将被永久销毁。

label.90.en_text: 1. Conquering a city will make you its lord. Lords will collect 10% taxes and earn 30% of city coffers.
label.90.cn_text: 1. 征服一个城市会让您成为领主。领主可以收取城市内交易的10%作为税收，并且在每次金库发放中可以获得30%的金库金额奖励。

label.264.en_text: 1. The target city event is a timed event where players will be awarded points based on their attacks of a random city. The 3 players with the most points at the end of the event will win the main prizes.
label.264.cn_text: 1. 目标城市是一个限时活动，玩家攻击或坚守系统选出的城市会获得积分奖励，前三名获得最高积分的玩家将在活动结束后赢得大额的奖金。

label.284.en_text: Infantry troops gain +2 Str when defending.

label.255.en_text: Hero titles will be given out for special achievements and will grant special perks and buffs.
label.255.cn_text: 英雄头衔会给予特殊成就，并且为英雄提供各种增益效果。

label.237.en_text: This city is still recovering from the last siege battle. Wait until the timer expires to attack!
label.237.cn_text: 这个城市刚刚易主，需要等待一段时间才能再次攻打！

label.91.en_text: 2. There are 3 types of cities: Villages, Towns, and Cities. The larger the city, the higher the defenders advantage.
label.91.cn_text: 2. 目前城市有3种规模：村庄，城镇和城市。城市的规模越大，在防御战中就更具有城防优势。

label.145.en_text: 1. Leaderboard rankings are announced by the dev team on Social media. Prizes and duration may vary. Winners will be announced on social media.
label.145.cn_text: 1. 排行榜奖金由开发团队决定并提前在社交媒体上公布。 排行榜持续时间决定了活动何时结束。 获奖者将在社交媒体上公布。

label.246.en_text: These character traits will give your hero special stat modifiers.
label.246.cn_text: 这些角色个性会为你的英雄属性带来影响。

label.238.en_text: An error ocurred due to a node synchronization delay.
label.238.cn_text: 抱歉，因为区块链节点确认延迟，该交易传输无法完成。

label.202.en_text: You just received this item drop and have been removed from the winning stronghold!

label.302.cn_text: 当防御时，我方步兵会造成额外10%伤害

label.285.en_text: Cavalry troops gain +3 Str when defending.

label.92.en_text: 3. Laying siege costs 50 TRX. 50% of the attack fee will go to the city coffers that can later be claimed by Lords.
label.92.cn_text: 3. 发动城市征服战的费用为50TRX。50%的费用会自动存入到被攻击城市的金库中，等待着每周被领主玩家所领取。

label.147.en_text: 3. Prizes will be reviewed and sent out to player wallets after the official announcement. Please contact support if you do not receive your prize within 48 hours.
label.147.cn_text: 3. 官方将在活动结束并公示后，将奖金陆续发送至玩家的钱包，如果您在48小时后仍然没有获得奖金发放，请联系官网客服。

label.56.cn_text: 人们面对面交易货品的场所

label.307.cn_text: 当攻击时，我方弓兵攻击+3

label.206.cn_text: 这个城市的市场已满。尝试去其他城市售卖你的道具吧。

label.57.en_text: Greetings Lord, and welcome to my store. I have long traveled the world seeking out the rarest goods. Do you hold the items I currently desire? I will pay a fine price if you do.
label.57.cn_text: 领主大人你好, 欢迎来到我的小店。我一直在周游世界, 寻找最稀有的货物。你持有我目前想要的物品吗？如果你有, 我可以提供不错的价格来购买它。

label.95.cn_text: 6. 保护冷却时间将会随机生成，可能性：1小时（50%）3小时（25%）或5小时（25%）。

label.208.cn_text: 这个据点刚刚易手，还没有超过24小时。请稍后再试。

label.319.cn_text: 领主赏金将依据您的头衔进行定期支付！

label.265.en_text: 2. Target cities will be selected randomly. Once a city is selected, it will be a target for 12 hours and grant one point when attacked or 3 points when held for over 1 hour. Once the 12 hours have expired, a new city will be selected. A total of 10 cities will be selected randomly for the entirety of the event.
label.265.cn_text: 2. 目标城市是由系统随机选择的。一旦某个城市被选中，之后的12个小时内针对其的每次进攻将获得1点积分，而坚守该城市每小时则获得3点积分。当12个小时的目标时间过期后，一个新的目标城市将被选出。活动期间总计会选择10个城市作为目标。

label.340.en_text: 1. Titles can be earned through completing various tasks and will grant a share of the current title drop pool. The size and time of the current drop pool can be seen in the bottom of this screeen.
label.340.cn_text: 1. 头衔可以通过完成一系列的任务要求来达成并且可以获得分享领主赏金的机会。当前赏金池的金额可以在领主赏金界面进行查看

label.100.en_text: 1. The BUY tab displays all items currently up for sale on the BLOCKLORDS map.
label.100.cn_text: 1. 购买标签下展示了目前BLOCKLORDS全世界正在售卖的物品。

label.343.en_text: 4. Once a card has been claimed, you can EQUIP it to your hero.
label.343.cn_text: 4. 头衔已经获取之后，你可以选择装备上它

label.211.en_text: If the required amount does not match your action, reject the transaction and contact support.
label.211.cn_text: 如果您看到支付金额有误，请取消并联系客服。

label.328.cn_text: 3. 从据点获得10个道具掉落

label.223.en_text: has been captured by another player. You will no longer receive taxes from here.
label.223.cn_text: 已被其他玩家攻占。你将无法从该城市获取税收了。

label.101.en_text: 2. If you want to buy an item, you can buy it directly by clicking on the BUY button and confirming the transaction.
label.101.cn_text: 2. 如果您有意购买其中的一件道具，你可以点击购买按钮并确认钱包交易。

label.210.en_text: This action requires a fee. Please confirm the transaction if you wish to proceed.
label.210.cn_text: 这一操作需要支付费用，请在交易前确认付费。

label.287.en_text: Infantry troops gain +8 HP when defending.

label.217.en_text: Your transaction has been confirmed by the blockchain. Get back to playing!
label.217.cn_text: 你的交易传输已被区块链确认。继续游戏吧！

label.102.en_text: 3. A 10% lord tax and 5% dev fee will be automatically added to the listing price.
label.102.cn_text: 3. 出售界面会展示您目前在各城市售卖的道具物品。

label.229.en_text: This Stronghold was captured less than one hour ago. Try again later!
label.229.cn_text: 这个据点刚刚易主，还没有超过1小时。请稍后再试。

label.103.en_text: 4. You can filter items by type, quality and price in the upper right section of the screen.
label.103.cn_text: 4. 您可以按照装备部位、品质和价格等不同条件来筛选出您想要的结果。

label.104.en_text: 5. Once the market time expires, market sellers must REMOVE the item from the market of the city where it is listed.
label.104.cn_text: 5. 当售卖道具逾期后，出售的玩家必须点击下架，才能将道具回收至自己的库存中。

label.212.en_text: The transaction failed because it was not confirmed by your wallet. Try again!
label.212.cn_text: 交易失败，你的钱包未确认此笔交易，请重试。

label.213.en_text: Contact support if you think something went wrong.
label.213.cn_text: 如果多次失败，请联系客服。

label.215.en_text: The transaction failed because you don't have enough TRX in your wallet. Check the Fee page for the latest pricing information.
label.215.cn_text: 交易传输失败，你的TRX余额不足。您可以前往费用页面查看所需金额。

label.249.en_text: Intelligence is determined by your helmet and will determine how fast your hero recovers his troops.
label.249.cn_text: 智力由头盔提供并决定了士兵回复速度。

label.216.en_text: Contact support if you think something went wrong.

label.214.en_text: Your transaction is now pending confirmation. Please wait for the transaction to be confirmed by the blockchain.
label.214.cn_text: 你的传输正等待确认。请等待区块链确认您的交易信息。

label.266.en_text: 3. Each target city round, one player will be randomly selected as the lucky bastard. That player will receive 10 extra points. Each player who attacked during a round has the same chance of being the lucky bastard, regardless of amount of attacks. The player who became the lucky bastard the most times during the entire event will win the special prize.
label.266.cn_text: 3. 每轮目标城市中会选中一位攻击过目标城市的玩家成为幸运儿。幸运儿玩家可以直接获得10点积分。每一位在攻击过目标城市的玩家都拥有相同的机会成为幸运儿，攻击次数的多少并不影响获得幸运儿的几率。整个活动成为幸运儿次数最多的玩家还可以获得幸运儿特殊奖金。

label.74.en_text: 1. These 3 heroes have been randomized for you only. If you wish to play BLOCKLORDS, you must select one of these heroes. They cannot be refreshed.
label.74.cn_text: 1. 这3个英雄是我们为您随机生成的。想要继续游戏，您必须选择其中一个英雄进行扮演。这三个选项是无法刷新重置的。

label.111.en_text: Invite new players to BLOCKLORDS and earn 50% of the hero ceration fee directly to your wallet!
label.111.cn_text: 邀请你的好友来玩BLOCKLORDS，每成功创建一个英雄你将获得50%的创建费用作为佣金奖励！

label.112.en_text: The link can be used an unlimited amount of times.
label.112.cn_text: 邀请链接的使用次数没有限制。
